title: Zlatan Ibrahimović
summary: Zlatan Ibrahimović (Swedish: [ˈslǎːtan ɪbraˈhǐːmʊvɪtɕ], Bosnian: [zlǎtan ibraxǐːmoʋitɕ]; born 3 October 1981) is a Swedish professional footballer who plays as a striker for Serie A club AC Milan and the Sweden national team. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest strikers of all time.[3][4][5][6][7] Ibrahimović is one of the most decorated active footballers in the world,[lower-alpha 1] having won 31 trophies in his career.[10] He has scored over 570 career goals, including more than 500 club goals,[11] and has scored in each of the last four decades.[12][13]
